Ability.Name: Lava Lash
Ability.Lua:
SF = UnitDebuffID("target", 77657) if SF == 5 then return true end
return true

Ability.Name: Flame Shock
Ability.Lua: local fsDebuff = UnitDebuffID("target", 8050, "PLAYER|HARMFUL") if fsDebuff == nil and UnitExists("target") then return true end

Ability.Name: Lightning Shield
Ability.Lua: LS = UnitBuffID("player", 324) if LS == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Lightning Bolt
Ability.Lua: _, _, _, count, _, _, _, _, _, _, _ = UnitBuffID("player", 78152) if count == 5 then return true end

Ability.Name: Searing Totem
Ability.Lua:
haveTotem, totemName, startTime, duration = GetTotemInfo(1)
if totemName ~= "Searing Totem" then return true else end

Ability.Name: Magma Totem
Ability.Lua:
haveTotem, totemName, startTime, duration = GetTotemInfo(1)
if totemName ~= "Magma Totem" then return true else end

Ability.Name: Chain Lightning
Ability.Lua: _, _, _, count, _, _, _, _, _, _, _ = UnitBuffID("player", 78152) if count == 5 then return true end

Ability.Name: Call of the Elements
Call of the Ancestors
